\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Node to perform the go\+\_\+to\+\_\+waypoint action of the P\+D\+DL domain. 

\begin{DoxyVersion}{Version}
1.\+0 
\end{DoxyVersion}
\begin{DoxyAuthor}{Author}
Alessio Roda 
\end{DoxyAuthor}
\begin{DoxyDate}{Date}
October 2022
\end{DoxyDate}
description\+: This node implements the R\+O\+S\+Plan Go\+To\+Waypoint\+Action\+Interface\+: the corresponding behaviour for the go\+\_\+to\+\_\+waypoint action in the P\+D\+Dl file
